appPrivacyPolicy.title: Editan Desktop na Lumi H5P - Manufar Sirri
appPrivacyPolicy.definitions:
Don taimaka maka fahimtar manufar sirrinmu an fassara ta atomatik daga asalin Ingilishi , wanda shine takaddar doka. Idan baku fahimci sassan wannan takaddar ba, tuntube mu kamar yadda aka bayyana a ƙasa.

Editan Lantarki na Lumi H5P shine aikace-aikacen da "Lumi Education GbR Jan Philip Schellenberg und Sebastian Rettig" ("Lumi Education GbR", "mu" da "kamfaninmu" ke koyarwa). Wannan dokar kare sirrin zata bayyana yadda kamfanin mu ke amfani da bayanan sirri da muke karba daga gare ku yayin da kuke amfani da manhajar.
appPrivacyPolicy.scope:

Idan kun zazzage shi daga shagon aikace-aikacen, wannan dokar ta sirri tana aiki ne kawai idan kun saukar da shi daga shigarwar shagon hukuma na Lumi Education GbR, wanda zai iya samun ɗayan waɗannan masu bugawar (ko taƙaita waɗannan):

appPrivacyPolicy.basisHeading: A kan me muke tattara bayananku?
appPrivacyPolicy.basisText: Muna tattara ko watsa bayananku tare da yardar ku (Art. 6 (1) a GDPR) don lambobi 1-9 ta hanyar maganganun yarda a farkon farkon Lumi. Ana buƙatar watsa bayanai a cikin lambobi 6-9 don editan H5P da mai kunnawa suyi aiki. Idan kun ƙi shi, to ba zai yiwu a zahiri ku yi amfani da ka'idar ba. Ana tattara bayanai bisa ga lamba 10 tare da bayyananniyar yarda da aka bayar kafin amfani da Lumi Run.
appPrivacyPolicy.usageHeading: Ta yaya za mu yi amfani da bayananka?
appPrivacyPolicy.usageText:
Kamfaninmu yana tattara bayananku (lambobi 1-5) don haka zamu iya:
  • yanke shawarar waɗanne ɓangarorin aikace-aikacen ya kamata a haɓaka gaba (misali zaɓin yarukan da za a iya amfani da su)
  • don inganta ƙirar mai amfani
  • nemo kuma gyara kwari
  • tuntuɓar ku tare da tambayoyin da suka biyo baya game da bug ɗin da kuka ruwaito
Ba a amfani da bayananku don yanke shawara na mutum, gami da yin bayanan.

Ba za a raba bayanan da muka samu game da kai ba ga wasu kamfanoni ko kungiyoyi, sai dai idan doka ta bukaci mu yi hakan (misali don aiwatar da doka) da kuma dalilan sarrafawa (duba kasa). Ya fi ƙarfinmu yadda ake amfani da bayanan da ake watsawa kai tsaye zuwa wasu kamfanoni (lambobi 6-9) da su.
appPrivacyPolicy.storageHeading: Ta yaya za mu adana bayananka?

storageText.sentence1: Kamfaninmu yana amfani da mai sarrafa bayanai don adana bayanan game da amfanin aikace-aikacenku (lambobi 1-5 da 10) akan tsarin da Hetzner Online GmbH, Industriestr ke gudanarwa. 25, D-91710 Gunzenhausen, Jamus.
storageText.sentence2: Kamfaninmu zai adana bayananka har tsawon shekaru biyu bayan an tattara shi. Da zarar wannan lokacin ya ƙare, za mu share bayananku.
storageText.sentence3: Ya fi ƙarfinmu yadda za a adana bayanan da ke kai tsaye zuwa ɓangare na uku (lambobi 6-9) da su da kuma tsawon lokacin da suke. Kamar yadda wasu masu karɓa ke zaune a cikin Amurka, da alama ana watsa bayananku zuwa kuma adana su a cikin Amurka.

appPrivacyPolicy.rightsText: Kamfaninmu zai so tabbatar da cewa kuna da cikakkiyar masaniya game da duk haƙƙin kariyar bayananku. Kowane mai amfani yana da haƙƙin mai zuwa:

rightsList.r1: 'Yancin kin amincewa da aiki - Kana da damar kin kamfanin mu na sarrafa bayanan ka, a karkashin wasu halaye.
rightsList.r2: 'Yancin samun dama - Kana da damar neman kamfanin mu don kwafin bayanan ka. Weila mu biya ku aan kuɗi kaɗan don wannan sabis ɗin.
rightsList.r3: 'Yancin gyarawa - Kuna da' yancin neman kamfanin mu ya gyara duk wani bayanin da kuka yi imani da shi ba daidai bane. Hakanan kuna da damar neman kamfaninmu don kammala bayanan da kuka yi imanin bai cika ba.
rightsList.r4: 'Yancin gogewa - Kana da' yancin neman kamfaninmu ya goge bayananka, a karkashin wasu halaye.
rightsList.r5: Hakki na ƙuntata aiki - Kana da damar neman kamfaninmu ya taƙaita sarrafa bayanan ka, a ƙarƙashin wasu sharuɗɗa.
rightsList.r6: 'Yancin damar daukar bayanai - Kana da damar neman kamfaninmu ya mika bayanan da muka tattara zuwa ga wata kungiya, ko kuma kai tsaye gare ka, a karkashin wasu halaye.

appPrivacyPolicy.rightsContact:
Idan kayi nema, muna da wata daya don amsa maka. Idan kanaso kayi amfani da kowane irin wadannan hakkoki, sai ka tuntube mu ta email dinmu: c@Lumi.education

Duk buƙatun game da bayanan da aka watsa kamar yadda aka bayyana a lambobi 6-9 dole ne a miƙa su kai tsaye zuwa ga masu karɓa.
appPrivacyPolicy.otherSitesHeading: Manufofin sirrin wasu shafukan yanar gizo
appPrivacyPolicy.otherSitesText: Manhajarmu ta ƙunshi hanyoyin haɗi zuwa wasu rukunin yanar gizo. Dokar sirrinmu tana aiki ne kawai ga rukunin yanar gizon mu, don haka idan ka latsa hanyar haɗi zuwa wani gidan yanar gizon, ya kamata ku karanta manufofin su na sirri.
appPrivacyPolicy.changesHeading: Canje-canje ga manufofinmu na tsare sirri
appPrivacyPolicy.changesText: Kamfaninmu yana kiyaye manufofinsa na sirri a ƙarƙashin nazari na yau da kullun kuma yana sanya kowane sabuntawa akan wannan shafin yanar gizon. Wannan sabunta sirrin an sabunta ta a ranar 10 ga Yuli 2021.
appPrivacyPolicy.contactText: Idan kuna da wasu tambayoyi game da tsarin sirrin kamfaninmu, bayanan da muke riƙe a kanku, ko kuma kuna so kuyi amfani da ɗaya daga cikin haƙƙin kariyar bayananku, da fatan za ku yi jinkirin tuntuɓar mu. Email da mu a: c@Lumi.education
appPrivacyPolicy.authorityHeading: Yadda zaka tuntubi hukumar da ta dace
appPrivacyPolicy.authorityText:
Idan kuna son yin rahoton ƙarar ko kuma kuna jin cewa kamfaninmu bai magance damuwar ku ta hanyar da ta dace ba, kuna iya tuntuɓar Ofishin Kwamishinan Bayanai.
